main.name: Himmet GENCER
main.description: Hi, I am Himmet. I am a software developer
main.bio: Hi, I am Himmet. I am a software developer, designing desktop, web, iot applications for embedded and test systems, especially I have developed notable applications in the electronics and test systems fields, such as designing data acquisition systems, data acquisition software, "electromechanical and servo hydraulic control and test systems" , "web based desicion support systems for structural health monitoring center"
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a researcher and am always interested in playing around with new technologies

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (BE) Electrical and Electronics Engineering

work.company: TDG Earthquake and Structural Health Monitoring Systems
work.title: Software Development Coordinator
work.description: Manage of software R&D team development and design of embedded systems, gui design such as data acquisition and test software, web applications and backend services for structural health monitoring

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Information Management Systems/Network Enterprise Systems/Enterprise Application Development (PAF Team)

skills.name: C/C++
skills.description: I use C/C++ for embedded programming on ARM MCUs.

skills.name: LabVIEW
skills.description: I use LabVIEW for GUI designs and applications, such as data acquisition and test applications.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: I enjoy Python because it allows fast programming.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for version control.

skills.name: Embedded Systems
skills.description: I have designed and developed a lot of embedded systems. STM32, NXP MCU,  I2C, SPI, CAN, RS485, UART, PWM, TCP, UDP, ADC, DAC, GPS, USB, RTOS .

skills.name: Measurement and Test Systems
skills.description: I have designed and developed a lot of measurement and test Systems, such as data acquisition systems, servo hydraulic and electromechanical test and control systems.

skills.name: Sensor Technologies
skills.description: I have designed applications using several sensors. Accelerometer, Strain Gauge, IMU, Thermocouple, Loadcell, Tiltmeter, Displacement, Crack, Wind .

skills.name: MERN Stack
skills.description: I use MERN Stack when creating web based applications.
